Title: The Unlived Life Inventory
Description: List dreams and paths you abandoned due to others' expectations, then circle three that still call to you
Completion Criteria: List has 10+ items, three are circled

Title: The Avoided Conversation
Description: Tell one person a truth about yourself you've been hiding - real aspirations or a boundary
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened, documented what you said

Title: The Authentic Day
Description: Spend one full day doing only what you genuinely want with no obligations or shoulds
Completion Criteria: Day completed, logged what you gravitated toward

Title: Values Audit
Description: Write your top 3 values, compare against last month's activities, make one scheduling change to realign
Completion Criteria: 3 values written, gaps identified, one calendar change made

Title: Personal Board of Directors
Description: Identify 3-5 people who support your authentic self and ask if you can consult them before major decisions
Completion Criteria: 3+ people confirmed yes

Title: The Reconnection
Description: Message three friends you haven't contacted in 1+ year with personalized messages referencing specific memories
Completion Criteria: 3 personalized messages sent (not generic)

Title: The Protected Call
Description: Schedule a recurring monthly call with someone important and complete 3 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: 3 consecutive monthly calls completed

Title: Letter to the Living
Description: Write a letter to a living person expressing everything you'd want them to know if they were dying and deliver it
Completion Criteria: 1+ page letter written, delivered by mail or read aloud

Title: The Friendship Trip
Description: Take a trip with a friend (not family) - day trip counts
Completion Criteria: Trip completed, photo together from the trip

Title: The Collision Dinner
Description: Host a meal introducing friends from different parts of your life who don't know each other
Completion Criteria: 3+ guests from 2+ different worlds, meal completed

Title: Specific Appreciation
Description: Tell 5 people what you specifically appreciate about them including a specific moment and how it affected you
Completion Criteria: 5 people told, each included specific moment + impact

Title: The Repair
Description: Make the first move to repair one damaged relationship even if you think they should apologize first
Completion Criteria: Reached out with repair intent, documented what you said

Title: Family Recording
Description: Record an interview with a parent or elder about their life story
Completion Criteria: 10+ questions prepared, 20+ min recording completed, saved in 2 locations

Title: Use Your Time Off
Description: Take your full vacation/PTO this year or 10+ days if self-employed
Completion Criteria: All PTO scheduled, all PTO taken

Title: The Boundary Week
Description: Leave work on time every day for one full work week
Completion Criteria: On time defined in writing, 5/5 days met target

Title: Choose Presence
Description: Attend one event important to someone you love that you would normally skip for work
Completion Criteria: Event attended, it genuinely conflicted with work

Title: True Hourly Wage
Description: Calculate real hourly wage including commute, work brought home, stress recovery, and expenses
Completion Criteria: Calculation completed, written reflection on trade-off

Title: Define Enough
Description: Calculate exactly how much money you need for the life you actually want
Completion Criteria: Number calculated with breakdown, compared to current trajectory

Title: Enroll in One Course
Description: Enroll in and complete a course on something you've always wanted to learn
Completion Criteria: Enrolled, completed with certificate or final project

Title: 12 Books Outside Your Lane
Description: Read 12 books this year in subjects outside your normal interests
Completion Criteria: 12 books completed outside typical reading

Title: The Skill You've Been Postponing
Description: Learn one skill you've been meaning to develop for years (instrument, language, craft)
Completion Criteria: Defined basic competency, reached that level

Title: Find a Mentor
Description: Approach someone whose path you admire and ask for mentorship
Completion Criteria: Person identified, ask made, at least 1 meeting happened

Title: Teach Something
Description: Teach something you know to someone else
Completion Criteria: Teaching session completed, learner could demonstrate what you taught

Title: Apply Anyway
Description: Apply for an opportunity you think you're not ready for (job, grant, program)
Completion Criteria: Application submitted (rejection doesn't matter)

Title: Start the Thing
Description: Start the project you've been planning for years and set a deadline for first draft/prototype
Completion Criteria: Deadline set, first draft/prototype completed by deadline

Title: The Relationship Conversation
Description: Have the difficult conversation about your relationship that you've been avoiding
Completion Criteria: Issue identified in writing beforehand, conversation happened

Title: Make the Decision
Description: Make a decision you've been postponing (the move, career change, ending, or beginning)
Completion Criteria: Decision made, first action taken toward implementing it

Title: Do Something That Scares You
Description: Do something that scares you that isn't actually dangerous (public speaking, asking someone out, traveling solo)
Completion Criteria: Scary thing identified beforehand, scary thing done

Title: Share Your Creative Work
Description: Share creative work with an audience (publish writing, show art, perform music, post online)
Completion Criteria: Work shared publicly, at least 1 person outside inner circle saw it

Title: The Forgiveness Letter
Description: Write a letter to someone you're holding resentment toward (you don't have to send it)
Completion Criteria: Letter written, consciously chose to release resentment

Title: The Old Apology
Description: Apologize for something you did years ago with a genuine apology that asks nothing in return
Completion Criteria: Apology delivered, asked for nothing in return

Title: Say I Love You
Description: Tell a family member I love you if you rarely do
Completion Criteria: Said it explicitly

Title: Express Suppressed Emotion
Description: Express anger or disappointment you've been suppressing (to therapist, trusted friend, or person directly)
Completion Criteria: Emotion identified, expressed to someone

Title: Write Your Eulogy
Description: Describe the person you want to be remembered as and note gaps between that vision and your current life
Completion Criteria: Eulogy written, gaps listed

Title: The Death Conversation
Description: Have a conversation about death with someone you love (wishes, fears, what you'd want each other to know)
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened, both people shared something meaningful

Title: Three Denied Things
Description: Identify three things you've denied yourself for no good reason, then do/get/allow one of them
Completion Criteria: 3 things listed, 1 done/obtained/allowed

Title: Eliminate Chronic Unhappiness
Description: Remove or significantly reduce one source of chronic unhappiness (relationship, habit, commitment, environment)
Completion Criteria: Source identified, concrete action taken to eliminate/reduce it

Title: Schedule Unproductive Joy
Description: Block weekly time for activities with no purpose beyond enjoyment and protect it for 4 consecutive weeks
Completion Criteria: Time blocked, 4 weeks completed

Title: Deliberate Silliness
Description: Do something intentionally silly or ridiculous and laugh properly
Completion Criteria: Silly thing done, you laughed for real

Title: Say No
Description: Decline an invitation or obligation that doesn't align with what matters to you
Completion Criteria: Said no to something you would have previously said yes to

Title: Gratitude Letter to Your Body
Description: Write a letter thanking your body and list everything it allows you to do that you take for granted
Completion Criteria: Letter written with 10+ things listed

Title: The Postponed Screening
Description: Get the health appointment/test/screening you've been putting off
Completion Criteria: Appointment scheduled, appointment completed

Title: One Sustainable Health Habit
Description: Establish one health habit you can maintain and track for 30 days
Completion Criteria: Habit defined, 30 days tracked

Title: Time with Declining Health
Description: Spend meaningful time with someone whose health is declining (aging relative, hospice volunteer, care facility visit)
Completion Criteria: 3+ visits or sessions completed

Title: The Postponed Trip
Description: Take the trip you've been putting off
Completion Criteria: Trip taken

Title: Try the Curious Thing
Description: Try one thing you've always been curious about (activity, food, place, experience)
Completion Criteria: Thing identified, thing tried

Title: Reverse Bucket List
Description: Document 20+ meaningful experiences you've already had
Completion Criteria: List of 20+ experiences written

Title: 24 Hours Unplanned
Description: Spend 24 hours somewhere unfamiliar without a plan
Completion Criteria: Location was unfamiliar, no itinerary made, 24 hours completed

Title: Your Unique Contribution
Description: Identify your unique contribution by answering: What would be lost if I never shared my unique perspective or skill?
Completion Criteria: Written answer (1+ paragraph)

Title: Begin the Legacy Project
Description: Start the thing you want to leave behind (memoir, oral history, mentorship, creation)
Completion Criteria: Project defined, first concrete milestone completed

Title: Complete a Health Screening
Description: Get a comprehensive physical exam with blood work
Completion Criteria: Receive results documentation

Title: Double Your Push-up Max
Description: Train until you can do 2x your current max consecutive push-ups, or reach 20 (whichever is greater)
Completion Criteria: Video of final set with good form

Title: Complete All Recommended Dental Work
Description: Get a dental exam and complete all recommended treatments or establish 30-day flossing habit
Completion Criteria: Exam done, treatment complete or 30-day floss streak

Title: Complete 6 Therapy Sessions
Description: Attend six sessions with a mental health professional, or complete structured self-guided program
Completion Criteria: Documentation of 6 completed sessions

Title: 30 Days Alcohol-Free
Description: Go 30 consecutive days without drinking
Completion Criteria: 30-day streak completed

Title: Sleep 8+ Hours for 14 Nights
Description: Get 8+ hours of actual sleep for two straight weeks
Completion Criteria: Sleep tracking data showing 14 consecutive nights

Title: Master 10 Healthy Meals
Description: Learn to cook 10 nutritious meals without recipes
Completion Criteria: Photos of all 10 meals + can cook any on request

Title: Complete an Endurance Goal
Description: Train for and finish a significant endurance challenge (half-marathon, 50-mile bike ride, 5K from zero)
Completion Criteria: Evidence of completing the event/goal

Title: Automate Retirement Savings
Description: Open a retirement account and set up automatic contributions
Completion Criteria: Account open + automatic transfer active

Title: Build an Emergency Fund
Description: Save enough to cover 1-3 months of essential expenses
Completion Criteria: Bank statement showing target balance reached

Title: Eliminate Highest-Interest Debt
Description: Pay off your highest-interest debt completely
Completion Criteria: $0 balance confirmation

Title: Complete a Salary Negotiation
Description: Negotiate compensation in current role or new offer
Completion Criteria: The negotiation conversation happened

Title: Calculate Your True Net Worth
Description: Document all assets, debts, income, and expenses
Completion Criteria: Written document with assets, liabilities, net worth, savings rate

Title: Hit a Personal Savings Milestone
Description: Reach a meaningful savings/investment target (save 20% for 6 months, increase savings rate, reach net worth milestone)
Completion Criteria: Documentation of milestone reached

Title: The Money Talk with Parents
Description: Direct conversation with parents about their financial situation, estate plans, and wishes
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened + can answer basic questions about their situation

Title: Read 3 Personal Finance Books
Description: Complete three foundational money books
Completion Criteria: All three finished

Title: Apply for Your Reach Job
Description: Submit a complete application for a position you feel underqualified for
Completion Criteria: Application submitted

Title: Launch a Side Project Publicly
Description: Create something and release it to the world (product, service, art, content, tool, newsletter)
Completion Criteria: It's live and others can access it

Title: Earn a Verifiable Credential
Description: Complete a recognized certification or course with proof of completion
Completion Criteria: Certificate or credential you can show

Title: Speak Up in Every Meeting for 30 Days
Description: Contribute at least one substantive comment or question in every work meeting
Completion Criteria: 30-day tracking log showing participation

Title: Pitch an Idea to Leadership
Description: Prepare and deliver a formal proposal to senior leadership
Completion Criteria: The pitch meeting happened

Title: Complete an Academic Course
Description: Finish a full course with structured curriculum
Completion Criteria: Course finished with all modules/assignments done

Title: Shadow Someone in Another Career
Description: Spend half a day+ observing someone in a field you're curious about
Completion Criteria: Shadow completed + written reflection

Title: Reach Conversational Level in New Language
Description: Learn enough to hold a 10-minute conversation with a native speaker
Completion Criteria: Verified conversation with native speaker completed

Title: Give a Presentation to 20+ People
Description: Deliver a talk to a live audience of at least 20 (meetup, workplace, community group)
Completion Criteria: Presentation delivered

Title: Write Your Career Story
Description: Document your career journey, lessons, goals, and 5-10 year plan
Completion Criteria: 2000+ word document completed and shared with mentor

Title: Weekly Family Calls for 3 Months
Description: Call one family member every week for 12 consecutive weeks
Completion Criteria: 12/12 calls logged

Title: Reconnect with a Lost Friend
Description: Reach out to someone you've lost touch with and have a real conversation
Completion Criteria: Real conversation (call or in-person), second interaction completed

Title: Write an Appreciation Letter
Description: Write a detailed letter to a parent or mentor about why they matter
Completion Criteria: 500+ words written, delivered

Title: Ask Out Someone Who Intimidates You
Description: Ask someone on a date who you're genuinely interested in but nervous about
Completion Criteria: The ask happened (outcome irrelevant)

Title: Host a Gathering of 10+ People
Description: Plan and execute a social event with at least 10 friends
Completion Criteria: Event happened + group photo

Title: Have the Difficult Conversation
Description: Identify and have a conversation you've been avoiding
Completion Criteria: Conversation happened + written reflection

Title: Interview an Elderly Relative
Description: Conduct a recorded interview about their life story, wisdom, and family history
Completion Criteria: Recording preserved (audio or video)

Title: Take a Trip with a Family Member
Description: Organize a trip (minimum overnight) with just one parent or sibling (camping, road trip, staycation counts)
Completion Criteria: Trip completed + photo together

Title: Say I Love You to 5 New People
Description: Tell five people you genuinely love that you love them - people you've never said it to before
Completion Criteria: All 5 documented (who and when)

Title: End a Relationship That Isn't Working
Description: End a relationship (romantic, friendship, professional) that you know isn't right
Completion Criteria: Relationship ended with honesty

Title: Solo Travel for One Week
Description: Take a solo trip to somewhere new staying at least 7 days
Completion Criteria: 7+ days completed + photo documentation

Title: Cross Off Your #1 Bucket List Item
Description: Identify and complete your single biggest bucket list item
Completion Criteria: Item completed

Title: Try Something That Terrifies You
Description: Take a class or try an activity that genuinely scares you (skydiving, improv, rock climbing)
Completion Criteria: One full session completed

Title: Live Somewhere Different for 1+ Month
Description: Spend at least 30 days living in a different location (house swap, work exchange, extended camping)
Completion Criteria: 30+ days in new location documented

Title: Attend a Major Event Alone
Description: Go to a concert, game, festival, or conference by yourself
Completion Criteria: Full event attended solo

Title: Complete a Digital Detox Trip
Description: Take a trip with no phone or internet for minimum 3 days
Completion Criteria: Trip completed + journal documentation

Title: Create a Finished Creative Work
Description: Learn a creative skill and produce a completed shareable piece (painting, music, writing, woodworking)
Completion Criteria: Finished piece exists and has been shared

Title: Do Something Out of Character
Description: Identify something you've secretly wanted to do but doesn't fit your image then do it
Completion Criteria: Activity completed

Title: Document One Year of Your Life
Description: Commit to a year-long documentation project (daily journaling, weekly photos, monthly videos)
Completion Criteria: 12 months of documentation preserved

Title: Write and Share Your Personal Values
Description: Articulate your core values, beliefs, and how you want to live
Completion Criteria: 1000+ word document completed and shared with accountability partner

Title: Make Amends for a Past Regret
Description: Identify something you genuinely regret and make direct amends (apologize, repair damage, restitution)
Completion Criteria: Amends made + documented

Title: Enforce Work Boundaries for 30 Days
Description: Set and maintain a strict work end-time for one month
Completion Criteria: 30-day compliance log

Title: Spend a Full Day Doing Exactly What You Want
Description: 8+ waking hours with no obligations, no shoulds, no productivity guilt
Completion Criteria: Day completed + documented how you spent it

Title: Write a Letter to Your 80-Year-Old Self
Description: Write to future you about your current life, hopes, fears, and commitments
Completion Criteria: 1000+ words written and saved

Title: Take the Trial Pledge
Description: Sign up for Giving What We Can's trial pledge (any amount for 6 months)
Completion Criteria: Signed up for trial pledge

Title: Fund One Child's Malaria Protection
Description: Donate any amount to Malaria Consortium or volunteer 2 hours for fundraising campaign
Completion Criteria: Donation made or volunteer hours completed

Title: Send a Direct Cash Transfer
Description: Send any donation to GiveDirectly
Completion Criteria: Donation sent

Title: Take the 10% Pledge
Description: Officially sign the Giving What We Can pledge at any income level
Completion Criteria: Pledge signed (lifetime commitment)

Title: Fund an Overlooked Intervention
Description: Donate any amount to the Lead Exposure Elimination Project
Completion Criteria: Donation made

Title: Calculate Your Global Wealth Percentile
Description: Complete the calculator at howrichami.givingwhatwecan.org
Completion Criteria: Screenshot of result

Title: Set Up Recurring Donations
Description: Establish automatic monthly donations to any effective charity
Completion Criteria: Recurring donation active

Title: Go Car-Free for One Month
Description: Complete 30 consecutive days without driving a personal vehicle
Completion Criteria: 30 days completed (emergency/accessibility exceptions allowed)

Title: Go Fully Plant-Based for 30 Days
Description: Complete 30 consecutive days eating no animal products
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days completed

Title: Skip One Long-Haul Flight This Year
Description: Decline or cancel one round-trip flight over 4 hours that you would have otherwise taken
Completion Criteria: Document the trip not taken and your alternative

Title: Switch to Renewable Electricity
Description: Switch your home to a renewable energy provider/green tariff or install any solar capacity
Completion Criteria: Switch confirmed or solar installed

Title: Reduce Meat Consumption by 50%
Description: Track and reduce your meat consumption by 50% compared to personal baseline over 30 days
Completion Criteria: Track meals one week before starting then maintain 50% reduction for 30 days

Title: Make Monthly Climate Calls
Description: Make phone calls to elected officials about climate legislation for 3 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: Calls made for 3 consecutive months

Title: Switch to a Climate-Conscious Bank
Description: Move your primary checking account to a bank that doesn't finance fossil fuel expansion
Completion Criteria: Account moved

Title: Reduce Food Waste by 50%
Description: Track and reduce household food waste by 50% vs baseline over 30 days
Completion Criteria: Weigh waste for one week before then maintain reduction for 30 days

Title: Join a Climate Advocacy Organization
Description: Become a member and attend/participate in 2+ events or actions
Completion Criteria: Member + attended 2+ events

Title: Eliminate Chicken and Fish for 30 Days
Description: Complete 30 consecutive days without eating chicken or fish
Completion Criteria: 30 days completed

Title: Donate to ACE-Recommended Charities
Description: Make any donation to Animal Charity Evaluators' Recommended Charity Fund
Completion Criteria: Donation made

Title: Support Corporate Welfare Campaigns
Description: Donate any amount to The Humane League or similar corporate campaign organization
Completion Criteria: Donation made

Title: Fund Shrimp Welfare
Description: Donate any amount to the Shrimp Welfare Project
Completion Criteria: Donation made

Title: Advocate for Plant-Based Defaults at Work
Description: Submit a formal proposal for plant-based default options in your workplace cafeteria/catering
Completion Criteria: Formal proposal submitted

Title: Replace Your Top 3 Animal Products
Description: Identify your 3 most-consumed animal products and replace them with plant-based alternatives for 60 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: Document replacements and track for 60 days

Title: Support Wild Animal Welfare Research
Description: Donate any amount to Wild Animal Initiative
Completion Criteria: Donation made

Title: Become a Big Brothers Big Sisters Mentor
Description: Complete application, training, match process and meet with mentee for 6+ months
Completion Criteria: Training complete, 6+ months of meetings with mentee

Title: Volunteer as a High-Dosage Tutor
Description: Complete one full semester tutoring 3+ sessions weekly through an established program
Completion Criteria: Semester completed with 3+ sessions weekly

Title: Donate Blood Six Times
Description: Complete 6 blood donations within one year (or recruit 6 others if medically ineligible)
Completion Criteria: 6 donations complete or 6 recruits confirmed

Title: Register Voters
Description: Volunteer 8+ hours for voter registration through a nonprofit during an election cycle
Completion Criteria: 8+ hours completed

Title: Serve on a Jury
Description: Respond to jury summons and serve fully (or be dismissed by court, not by own request)
Completion Criteria: Jury service completed

Title: Provide Pro Bono Professional Services
Description: Complete 50+ hours of pro bono work in your professional field within one year
Completion Criteria: 50+ hours documented

Title: Join or Start a Mutual Aid Network
Description: Actively participate in a mutual aid network for 3+ months
Completion Criteria: 3+ months of active participation

Title: Volunteer at a Food Bank
Description: Complete 16+ hours of food bank volunteering
Completion Criteria: 16+ hours completed

Title: Complete QPR Suicide Prevention Training
Description: Complete Question, Persuade, Refer gatekeeper training
Completion Criteria: Training completed

Title: Complete Mental Health First Aid Certification
Description: Receive your MHFA certification
Completion Criteria: Certification received

Title: Become a Crisis Line Volunteer
Description: Complete training and volunteer for 6+ months at a crisis line (Crisis Text Line, etc.)
Completion Criteria: Training complete + 6 months of volunteering

Title: Practice Systematic Kindness
Description: Perform 3 intentional acts of kindness twice weekly for 4 consecutive weeks (24 total acts documented)
Completion Criteria: 24 acts documented

Title: Start a Gratitude Practice
Description: Complete 30 consecutive days of gratitude journaling (3-5 items daily)
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive days documented

Title: Volunteer for a Befriending Program
Description: Complete 6+ months of weekly contact with an isolated individual through an official befriending program
Completion Criteria: 6+ months of weekly contact completed

Title: Share Your Mental Health Experience
Description: Have 3 conversations about your own mental health experiences with friends family or colleagues
Completion Criteria: 3 conversations documented

Title: Advocate for Workplace Mental Health
Description: Submit a formal proposal for mental health benefits/resources to your employer or HR
Completion Criteria: Formal proposal submitted

Title: Make Monthly Constituent Calls
Description: Make phone calls to elected representatives for 6 consecutive months
Completion Criteria: At least 1 call/month for 6 months

Title: Build a Relationship with Legislative Staff
Description: Have 3+ substantive interactions with the same staff member over 6 months
Completion Criteria: 3+ interactions (calls, meetings, detailed correspondence)

Title: Support a Backbone Organization
Description: Donate any amount or volunteer 10+ hours for an organization that coordinates collective action
Completion Criteria: Donation made or volunteer hours completed

Title: Participate in Nonviolent Collective Action
Description: Participate in 2 organized protests, marches, or collective actions within one year
Completion Criteria: 2 actions participated in

Title: Complete a Career Impact Assessment
Description: Complete written analysis of current work using ITN framework and compare against 3+ alternative paths
Completion Criteria: Written analysis completed

Title: Build Career Capital in a Neglected Field
Description: Complete substantial learning project in high-priority problem area (AI safety, biosecurity, etc.)
Completion Criteria: Course, certification, or side project completed

Title: Complete a Skills-Based Volunteering Project
Description: Complete one 5-10 hour consulting project through Catchafire, Common Impact, or similar
Completion Criteria: Project completed

Title: Optimize Workplace Giving
Description: Research employer's matching gift program and enroll/make matched donation or confirm no program exists
Completion Criteria: Enrolled in matching or confirmed no program

Title: Join a Nonprofit Board
Description: Complete governance training and serve on a nonprofit board or committee for 1+ year
Completion Criteria: Training complete + 1 year of service

Title: Contribute to Social Impact Open Source
Description: Make 3+ meaningful contributions (code, documentation, issues) to open source projects serving social good
Completion Criteria: 3+ meaningful contributions made

Title: Take the Further Pledge
Description: Formally commit to giving everything above a set living allowance to effective causes
Completion Criteria: Pledge signed (lifetime major commitment)

Title: Walk 50000 Steps in a Weekend
Description: Walk 50000 total steps across Saturday and Sunday
Completion Criteria: Screenshot of step tracker showing 50000+ steps in 48 hours

Title: Take Cold Showers for 30 Days
Description: Replace your regular shower with a cold shower every day for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 30 days without missing (no warm-up period allowed)

Title: Learn to Do the Splits
Description: Achieve a full front or side split through daily stretching
Completion Criteria: Photo showing hips flat on ground in full split

Title: Climb a Virtual Mountain on Stairs
Description: Accumulate stair climbing equivalent to a famous landmark's height (Empire State Building: 1576 steps, etc.)
Completion Criteria: Total steps climbed tracked across sessions

Title: Master a Complex Dance Routine
Description: Learn a full choreographed dance routine and perform it start to finish
Completion Criteria: Video performing complete routine from memory

Title: Drink Only Water for One Week
Description: Consume nothing but plain water for 7 consecutive days (no coffee soda juice alcohol tea)
Completion Criteria: 7 full days with zero other beverages

Title: Write a Short Story in One Night
Description: Write a complete short story from start to finish in a single overnight session
Completion Criteria: Minimum 1500 words with beginning, middle, end completed between sunset and sunrise

Title: Create a 24-Hour Time-Lapse Video
Description: Record a continuous 24-hour period and compile into a time-lapse video
Completion Criteria: Final video showing full day-night cycle from fixed position

Title: Make a One-Person Short Film
Description: Write, film, and edit a short film where you handle every role
Completion Criteria: Minimum 2 minutes, has script, you appear on screen, you edited it

Title: 30-Day Daily Photo Challenge
Description: Take one intentional creative photo every day for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: Collection of 30 photos each from different day with distinct theme

Title: Fold 100 Origami Cranes
Description: Fold 100 paper cranes using any paper available
Completion Criteria: Photo of 100 completed cranes together

Title: One-Week Art Style Sprint
Description: Create one piece of art in a different medium each day for 7 days
Completion Criteria: 7 pieces across 7 different mediums

Title: Record a One-Second-a-Day Video Diary
Description: Film one second of video every day for 90 days, then compile
Completion Criteria: Final compiled video of 90 seconds showing 90 different days

Title: Design Your Own Puzzle or Riddle
Description: Create an original puzzle that someone else can solve
Completion Criteria: Puzzle is solvable (tested), has clear rules

Title: Create a DIY Escape Room
Description: Design and build a puzzle experience in your home for others to solve
Completion Criteria: Minimum 3 connected puzzles, at least one person completes it, defined win state

Title: Compliment 100 Strangers
Description: Give 100 genuine compliments to people you don't know (in-person face-to-face)
Completion Criteria: 100 compliments delivered to strangers

Title: Rejection Therapy Week
Description: Deliberately ask for something you expect to be rejected for, once per day for 7 days
Completion Criteria: 7 rejection attempts across 7 days documented

Title: Perform at an Open Mic
Description: Perform something original in front of a live audience at an open mic event
Completion Criteria: Complete performance (comedy, poetry, music, storytelling) at public open mic

Title: Handwrite 10 Gratitude Letters
Description: Write and send 10 handwritten letters to people who have positively impacted your life
Completion Criteria: 10 separate handwritten letters, actually delivered

Title: Daily Kindness for a Month
Description: Perform one intentional act of kindness every day for 30 days
Completion Criteria: 30 documented acts across 30 consecutive days

Title: 24-Hour Silence
Description: Do not speak for a full 24 hours
Completion Criteria: 24 consecutive hours with zero spoken words

Title: No-Technology Day
Description: Spend 24 hours without any digital technology
Completion Criteria: 24 hours with no phone, computer, TV, tablet, or gaming devices

Title: No-Spend Month
Description: Buy nothing beyond true essentials for 30 days
Completion Criteria: 30 days with only groceries, medicine, bills, transport to work

Title: No Complaining for a Week
Description: Go 7 consecutive days without voicing any complaints
Completion Criteria: 7 days with zero verbal complaints (restart if you slip)

Title: One-Week Social Media Detox
Description: Log out of all social media for 7 days
Completion Criteria: 7 consecutive days with no social media access

Title: Memorize 50 Digits of Pi
Description: Memorize and recite 50 digits of pi from memory
Completion Criteria: Recite 3.14159... through 50 decimal places without reference

Title: Learn Basic Sign Language
Description: Learn the ASL alphabet and 20 common phrases
Completion Criteria: Fingerspell full alphabet from memory + sign 20 phrases without reference

Title: Learn Morse Code and Send a Message
Description: Memorize Morse code and use it to send a real message
Completion Criteria: Encode 10+ word sentence, transmit it (tapping, flashlight, sound)

Title: Use Your Non-Dominant Hand for a Day
Description: Use only your non-dominant hand for all tasks for one full waking day
Completion Criteria: All hand-based tasks done with non-dominant hand (eating, writing, opening doors)

Title: Complete a 1000-Piece Puzzle Solo
Description: Finish a 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle entirely by yourself
Completion Criteria: Photo of completed puzzle (done without help)

Title: Solve a Rubik's Cube
Description: Solve a Rubik's Cube from a fully scrambled state
Completion Criteria: Complete solve without looking up algorithms during the solve

Title: Learn to Juggle Three Balls
Description: Juggle three objects continuously
Completion Criteria: Video of juggling 3 objects for 30+ seconds without dropping

Title: Master a Magic Trick
Description: Learn one magic trick well enough to fool people
Completion Criteria: Perform trick for at least 3 different people without revealing how

Title: Balance a Broom on Your Nose
Description: Balance a broom handle vertically on your nose
Completion Criteria: Video of 60+ seconds of continuous balance

Title: Build a Five-Story Card House
Description: Construct a house of cards at least 5 levels high
Completion Criteria: Photo of standing card house with 5+ tiers (no tape or adhesive)

Title: Bake 10 Unique Recipes in 48 Hours
Description: Make 10 different baked goods or cooked dishes in one weekend
Completion Criteria: 10 distinct recipes, completed within 48 hours, photo documentation

Title: Walk Every Street in Your Neighborhood
Description: Physically walk down every street within a defined area
Completion Criteria: Define boundary before starting, track on map, every street walked

Title: Spend a Day Blindfolded
Description: Experience a full waking day without sight
Completion Criteria: Wear blindfold from waking until bedtime (have someone nearby for safety)

Title: Camp in Your Backyard
Description: Sleep outside overnight at your own home
Completion Criteria: Full night sleeping outdoors (balcony or rooftop counts)

Title: See Sunrise and Sunset in One Day
Description: Intentionally watch both the sunrise and sunset on the same day
Completion Criteria: Present and watching during both events on same calendar day

Title: Make a Personal Time Capsule
Description: Create a sealed collection of current items and notes for your future self
Completion Criteria: Container sealed with do not open until date (minimum 5 years), stored safely

Title: Sock-Stacking Speed Record Attempt
Description: Put as many socks on one foot as possible in 30 seconds
Completion Criteria: Video with visible timer and final count

Title: Most Clothespins on Your Face
Description: Clip as many clothespins to your face as possible in 60 seconds
Completion Criteria: Video of attempt with final count

Title: Blindfolded Candy Chopstick Challenge
Description: Blindfolded, pick up and eat small candies using only chopsticks in 60 seconds
Completion Criteria: Video documenting attempt with final count

Title: One-Handed Toilet Paper Unroll
Description: Completely unroll a full toilet paper roll using only one hand
Completion Criteria: Timed video showing full unroll with one hand

Title: Balance Spoons on Your Face
Description: Balance as many spoons as possible on your face simultaneously
Completion Criteria: Photo showing all spoons balanced at once (no adhesive)

Title: Blow a Giant Bubblegum Bubble
Description: Blow the largest bubblegum bubble you can
Completion Criteria: Photo or video of largest bubble with something for scale

Title: Eat Beans with a Toothpick
Description: Eat as many baked beans as possible in 60 seconds using only a toothpick
Completion Criteria: Video of attempt with final count (one bean at a time speared)

Title: Declutter 100 Items
Description: Remove 100 items from your home (donated, recycled, or discarded)
Completion Criteria: 100 items removed, duplicates count individually

Title: Build Something Useful from Scrap
Description: Create a functional object using only materials you already have or can get for free
Completion Criteria: Object serves real purpose, made from repurposed materials, photo in use

Title: Spontaneous Road Trip
Description: Take an unplanned trip to somewhere you've never been
Completion Criteria: Return home with photo from destination

Title: Sunrise Summit
Description: Reach any elevated viewpoint (hill, rooftop, overlook) before sunrise
Completion Criteria: Witness the sunrise from your chosen spot

Title: Sleep Under the Stars
Description: Spend a night sleeping outdoors where you can see the sky
Completion Criteria: Slept outside overnight (backyard counts)

Title: Adrenaline First
Description: Do something that genuinely scares you physically (zip-line, cliff jump, roller coaster, cold plunge)
Completion Criteria: Done the activity once (scale to personal fear threshold)

Title: Wild Water Entry
Description: Fully submerge yourself in a natural body of water (lake, river, ocean, waterfall)
Completion Criteria: Gone completely underwater at least once

Title: Bucket List Location
Description: Visit a place you've always wanted to see in person
Completion Criteria: Physically there with photo proof

Title: Hometown Tourist
Description: Spend a full day exploring your own area as if you were a visitor
Completion Criteria: Visited at least 3 spots you'd never been to before

Title: Solo Navigation
Description: Travel somewhere unfamiliar alone and navigate without GPS for at least part of it
Completion Criteria: Solo trip completed using maps, signs, or asking locals

Title: Multi-Day Journey
Description: Complete a physical journey lasting 2+ days (hiking, biking, walking between towns)
Completion Criteria: Traveled under your own power for at least 2 consecutive days

Title: Festival Immersion
Description: Attend a cultural celebration or community event outside your usual circle
Completion Criteria: Participated (not just observed) in at least one activity

Title: Write and Share Original Work
Description: Write something personal and share it with at least one person
Completion Criteria: Someone else has read your writing

Title: Create and Display Art
Description: Make a piece of visual art and put it somewhere others can see it
Completion Criteria: Creation displayed (wall, online, gifted)

Title: Learn One Song
Description: Learn to play or sing one complete song
Completion Criteria: Can perform it start to finish for at least one person

Title: Cook Something New
Description: Prepare a dish from a cuisine you've never cooked before
Completion Criteria: Eaten the finished dish

Title: Build Something Functional
Description: Create something useful with your hands (furniture, clothing, tool, craft)
Completion Criteria: Item exists and works for intended purpose

Title: 30-Day Creative Streak
Description: Do one creative act daily for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: 30 dated entries with no gaps

Title: Produce Media
Description: Create a short film, song, podcast episode with clear beginning and end
Completion Criteria: Finished product shared with at least one person

Title: Finish a Challenging Book
Description: Read a book you've been putting off or that stretches you intellectually
Completion Criteria: Read the final page

Title: Host a Gathering
Description: Organize and host a social event at your place (any size and format)
Completion Criteria: Guests came, stayed, and left

Title: Meet Someone New
Description: Attend an event where you know few/no people and start a genuine conversation
Completion Criteria: Exchanged contact info or made plans to meet again

Title: Plan a Surprise
Description: Secretly organize something special for someone you care about
Completion Criteria: Executed it and witnessed their reaction

Title: Organize a Reunion
Description: Bring together a group of people who haven't all been together in a while
Completion Criteria: Reunion happened (virtual or in-person)

Title: Day of Yes
Description: Let someone else plan a full day and participate in everything they choose
Completion Criteria: Completed entire day as planned by them

Title: Phone-Free Time Together
Description: Spend at least 4 hours with others without anyone using phones
Completion Criteria: Time passed with devices put away

Title: Host Game or Theme Night
Description: Plan and run a themed social event (game night, trivia, costume party)
Completion Criteria: Event happened and people participated

Title: Join a Regular Group
Description: Commit to a club, team, or recurring group for at least one month
Completion Criteria: Attended 4+ sessions and know people's names

Title: Volunteer Consistently
Description: Volunteer for the same organization at least 4 times over a month or more
Completion Criteria: Fulfilled commitment

Title: Random Kindness Day
Description: Spend one day intentionally doing kind things for strangers (3+ acts minimum)
Completion Criteria: Day over with at least 3 distinct kind acts

Title: Organize a Drive
Description: Collect items or funds from others for a cause and deliver them
Completion Criteria: Collected goods/money reached recipient organization

Title: Community Cleanup
Description: Participate in cleaning or improving a public space
Completion Criteria: Spent at least 2 hours on the effort

Title: Give Blood or Register
Description: Donate blood/plasma or register as organ/marrow donor
Completion Criteria: Donation complete or registration confirmed

Title: Help Someone with a Task
Description: Offer substantial help to someone (moving, repairs, childcare, yardwork)
Completion Criteria: Task is finished

Title: Mentor Someone
Description: Regularly guide someone less experienced in an area you know
Completion Criteria: Met with them at least 4 times and they've made progress

Title: Anonymous Good Deed
Description: Do something kind without the recipient knowing it was you
Completion Criteria: Deed done and remained anonymous

Title: Holiday Service
Description: Spend a holiday volunteering instead of or in addition to personal celebration
Completion Criteria: Completed volunteer shift on that day

Title: 30-Day Gratitude Journal
Description: Write down at least one thing you're grateful for every day for 30 days
Completion Criteria: 30 consecutive dated entries

Title: Letter to Future Self
Description: Write a detailed letter to yourself to open in 5+ years, then seal and store it
Completion Criteria: Letter written, dated, sealed, and stored

Title: Solo Retreat
Description: Spend at least one full day alone in intentional reflection (no obligations, minimal tech)
Completion Criteria: Day completed with at least one insight written down

Title: Face a Fear
Description: Identify a personal fear and take a concrete action to confront it
Completion Criteria: Done the scary thing once (scale to personal baseline)

Title: Achieve a Fitness Goal
Description: Set a specific physical goal based on current baseline and train until you hit it
Completion Criteria: Achieved measurable target you set

Title: Yes Day
Description: Spend one day saying yes to every safe opportunity that comes your way
Completion Criteria: Day over and followed through

Title: 30-Day Habit Challenge
Description: Commit to building one positive habit or breaking one negative habit for 30 consecutive days
Completion Criteria: Maintained streak for 30 days with no breaks

Title: Take One Step Toward a Big Goal
Description: Identify a major life goal and complete one concrete milestone toward it
Completion Criteria: Milestone done (first chapter written, money saved, application submitted)

Title: Create Your Life Timeline
Description: Document the major chapters and lessons of your life so far
Completion Criteria: Written or visual record to look back on

Title: Digital Detox Day
Description: Spend 24 hours without phones computers or internet
Completion Criteria: Full 24 hours passed
